definition: The Butterfly Lovers, Chinese folktale of the tragic love between Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai
pinyin: Liang2 Shan1 bo2 yu3 Zhu4 Ying1 tai2

definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
female warrior role in Chinese opera
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
Tale of the White Snake/Madame White Snake
